div.p: (a) HadCRUT4 global mean surface temperature time series with a 10‐year smoothing applied. For each decade, a 15‐year trend is calculated. The red triangles correspond to warming trends and the blue triangles to cooling trends. (b) Map of local surface temperature trends between1960 and 1990. (c) The same as (b), but for 1985–2015.
